channel.title: +1 Forward - FitD series - Copperhead County
channel.description:
https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/1-forward/summer-series-fitd-copperhead-county
Rach and Rich continue their second Summer Series. This series covers games in the Forged in the Dark (FitD) style of PbtA games. This sixth episode features Jason Eley
Timecodes: 00:01:28 - **Setting Position and Effect** - Using Setting Elements in FitD games 00:08:43 - **Progress Clock** on *Copperhead County* 00:19:08 - **The Score** - Rich and Rach
You can find *Copperhead County* here: https://guitartown.itch.io/copperhead
Other FitD games with cool settings mentioned by Jason: *Band of Blades, Rebel Crown, Nocturne, Hello World*
